entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
